parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Force [[Suppressive Fire|suppressive fire]] from the unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''suppressFor''' duration

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> duration: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code> _soldier1 '''suppressFor''' 10 </code>
Will force soldier1 to do suppressive fire to known enemies during 10 seconds

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setSuppression]], [[getSuppression]], [[commandSuppressiveFire]], [[doSuppressiveFire]]
</value></part></template>
